text: imi neohuileul wihae gyesiga iss-eossnola du budaega jeonjaeng-eul hamae han budaeneun hananim-ui gil-eseo ssawossgo daleun budaeneun midji anahayeoss-eumyeo geudeul-ui susjaneun gobjeol-ieossdoda geuleona hananim-eun geubun-ui tteus-e ttala seunglileul geodusini sillo igeos-eun nun-eul gajinjadeul-eul wihan gyohun-ila
